page.title: 11Canal Cruising
page.content: The canal that runs through this area is the Stratford_upon_Avon canal.This stretch of canal has got 5 locks on it.The canal was opened in 1813 and reopened again in 1964 after restoration.It is a very busy canal with the majority of boats carrying holiday makers. Most of the boats have a steel hull and a cabin top and a fitted wood interior.A boat for 4 persons is normally about 30 ft.long,for 5 persons normally about 46ft.long,for 6 or 7 persons about 50ft.long and about 60ft.long for 8 persons. Inside the boats,they are normally fitted out with a gas cooker,gas fridge, sinks, toilets, washbasins, showers, bunk-beds, central heating, television, etc.
